pullrequest.title: Add support for nested models in Gazebo

content.raw: I think it's a nice idea not to show the nested model's internal structure for now. I think it could be nice to load it differently into the 3D scene as well. Though I'm not sure if it's a nice idea to hide its internal structure (joints, collisons...), since it won't be possible to edit them, or if it's better to leave it there to give the user a notion of the whole model.
content.html: I think it's a nice idea not to show the nested model's internal structure for now. I think it could be nice to load it differently into the 3D scene as well. Though I'm not sure if it's a nice idea to hide its internal structure (joints, collisons...), since it won't be possible to edit them, or if it's better to leave it there to give the user a notion of the whole model.
